Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI has a small scope on topics doesn't have the full assignment idea, however the teacher knows exactly what the assignment needs and hence has better feedback, but teachers need to be more descriptive on their feedbacks, and more critical.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: My teacher made me realise alot more mistakes i have made.
